channel.title: How do u change a gfx of a wepion spec
channel.description: i want to change the gfx of some wepion specs, but i dont kno where to change it :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: How do u change a gfx of a wepion spec
item.dc:creator: @Jpspkz Jpspkz
item.description:
@Jpspkz wrote:

Open client.java and search for: public void darkbow() { if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) { setAnimation(426); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(55); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; resetAnimation(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(55); SpecialDelay -= 1;
Not the exact same. But something close to it. This is my dbow spec, now ima change the: setAnimation(426) to something random:

public void darkbow() { if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) { setAnimation(1512); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(55); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; resetAnimation(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(55); SpecialDelay -= 1;

See how to do it now?

Read full topic
item.source: How do u change a gfx of a wepion spec
